Address: 115-123 St Killian Street WHITE HILLS VIC 3550
Description:
Rare Development Opportunity
There are some who will look at this home on two separate titles totalling one-and-a-half acres (6070 square metres), and see the potential for multiple units (STCA), especially given that it's a rare opportunity to develop one of the last sizeable allotments in the area; and then others who will look and see a solid, light-filled four-bedroom home with a delightful ambience surrounded by a garden enthusiastically nurtured over many years. You can't do better than a heavenly home in a saintly street and this four-bedroom home fits the bill. Open-plan living is at one end while the bedrooms and bathroom are at the other. Large windows open up the home and frame aspects of the restful garden - flowers, foliage and trees - all round. The kitchen and meals area is roomy and bright. A wide two-door pantry stocks enough supplies for a big family and the gas cooktop and one-and-a-half-ovens caters for big numbers. Sliding doors open onto a long patio. For more formal occasions the dining room is ideal and opens off a spacious lounge both of which take in those superb views. Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling are throughout. Two of the four bedrooms have generous built-in wardrobes and all have ceiling fans. There's also a two-piece bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Externally, apart from the magnificent garden, there is a ripper of a double garage and workshop, 10m x 12m, steel-framed and solid brick, containing a basin and toilet and featuring a concrete floor, power, light and phone connection. There is also a second, smaller steel-framed shed. Offered with vacant possession.
Insights: 11 other 4 bedroom house in WHITE HILLS have recently been sold.

Description:
White Hills - Spacious and Gracious Living
Superb 5 bedroom period style home on 5 acres (approx) with dam and 2.5 megalitre water right close to Bendigo Racecourse. Offering horse paddocks, large workshop and a bungalow.
Features main bedroom with walk in robe and en-suite, 3 bedrooms with BIR's and the 5th bedroom could be used as a study or 2nd living area.
The large light and bright kitchen features ample cupboard space, wood stove plus electric cooking. The huge open meals/living area features a slow combustion fire for those cold winter nights with doors opening out to a spacious decked entertaining area.
The interior has the charm of yesteryear with the convenience of today. Everything about the home is spacious from the rooms to the grounds. With double carport and double garage/workshop there is room for all.
Quality properties on acreage close to the CBD such as this one are hard to find. Astute purchasers will recognize the opportunity this property presents with an inspection the only way to fully appreciate all this magnificent property has to offer. Possible subdivision potential (S.T.C.A).
Insights: 2 other 5 bedroom house in WHITE HILLS have recently been sold.

Located in a growing area of White Hills, this property is now looking for a new owner.

A Little Beauty

- 3 enormous bedrooms all with built in robes
- Open plan kitchen/meals area
- Large light, bright lounge
- Updated bathroom
- An abundance of storage space
- Ducted heating and split system cooling
- 780m² block (approx)
- Huge workshop complete with mechanics pit - ideal for the tradesman
- Parkland at the rear of the property
- Absolutely fantastic location
Move straight or renovate this fantastic home.

Description:
Great Starter
Located in a quiet no through road, handy to public transport, schools,botanical gardens and the new Epsom Shopping Centre. This 3 bedroom B/V home has an ensuite and WIR to the main and built in robes to the remainder. Enter the family lounge then through to the open plan tiled kitchen and dining area.The family bathroom services the other two bedrooms. The fully fenced yard is neatly landcaped and there is a terrific outdoor paved BBQ area with pergola. Single carport and 2 garden sheds make this property the complete package.

Description:
Families Where Are You? This Home is Equipped For The Good Life
Designed for todays needs, this modern home offers 4 bedrooms and a study. Beautiful floor tiling which leads from the front entry past the formal lounge-dining, through the attractive kitchen-meals-family room to the separate theatre room which is fully equipped with projector, screen and speakers. Entertaining is always a pleasure here as the indoor living leads directly to the outdoor paved area, where everything is desirable. Bonuses include side gate access perfect for boat or caravan. Double garage and naturally central heating and cooling. Located in a quiet cul-de-sac opposite a reserve. The ultimate choice in design and location!

Description:
Gracious Living At Its Best & Oh What A Beautiful Garden
A grand entrance invitingly welcomes you inside a home which is close to perfection. With an eye for detail the owners offer you comfort, relaxation, stylish outdoor alfresco entertaining area and a garden of great charm. The living area of almost 30 squares offers a design of 4 double bedrooms, plus a study. Formal lounge-dining, casual kitchen/meals/family and separate reading or TV room. Bonuses include being positioned overlooking a reserve, 30' x 20' workshop as well as a double garage. Here Grandeur Meets Convenience!

Description:
Just Move In & Enjoy!
This perfectly presented brick veneer home is located in a quiet no through road and offers 3 bedrooms (main with full ensuite and built in robes). A central bathroom services the remaining 2 bedrooms which also have built in robes. The kitchen/dining and lounge are open plan living. The home has slab floor heating and an airconditioner. Outdoors is a picture with its manicured gardens, lovely outdoor living area and private well secured yard. Single carport with roller door and a single work shed with power and concrete floor. This home would be perfect for the first home buyers or the retirees. Located close to the new Epsom shopping centre, public transport, schools and only a short drive to the CBD.
Directions: Heading toward Epsom turn right from the Midland Highway into Derrimut Rd (opp. Powercor) then right into Stamford St then right into Dundas St.

Description:
Near New with 4 Bedrooms + Study
Designed for todays busy family lifestyle with a low maintenance yard and located in amongst other quality homes in the popular Peppercorns Estate. Featuring 4 bedrooms (main with ensuite and walk in robe) plus a study. Separate formal lounge. Open plan kitchen /meals /family with sliding doors to the outdoor alfresco area. The modern kitchen has stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, 5 burner gas hotplates and electric wall oven. Three piece family bathroom. Extras include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double garage with remote and direct internal access. Walking distance to schools, local shops, sporting grounds, walking tracks, Lake Weeroona and only about a 5 minute drive to the CBD.

Description:
GROWTH CORRIDOR OPPORTUNITY
A solid brick Victorian terrace home offering two separate titles in one of Bendigos major growth corridors. Offering a convenient location to all of white hills facilities makes this a prime property to develop or recreate (subject to council approval).
The home has retained many of its original features and comprises 3 bedrooms, a large living area with OFP, feature bay window and pressed metal ceiling, spacious kitchen and meals area with a large walk-in pantry.
The current improvements offer a comfortable lifestyle to live in or lease out until you decide what is the best way to capitalise on this great opportunity.
Terms: 10% deposit, Balance 30 days.
The property will be auctioned as one lot number - 8 and 8a Lyons Street. If not sold, number 8 Lyons Street will be auctioned separately.

Description:
What A Bargain
Here is a great opportunity to secure an ideal one bedroom unit in a quiet complex of only four. Investors, first home buyers, downsizers or even those looking for a place to call home while at Uni will appreciate this brick unit.
The property comprises an open plan living and meals area, original kitchen with good cupboard space, combined bathroom and laundry facilities and good sized bedroom with built in robes. Located within a quiet pocket of White Hills close to local shops, primary schools, Weeroona College and only a short drive the Lake Weeroona and the heart of Bendigo.
